column1: Little Goat Diner////If you're looking for eccentric diner food
column2: then Little Goat is the place to be! I ordered the Tuna Melt and expected a normal melt
column3: but I received a Tuna Melt that looked very unique and different. The sourdough bread was placed on the bottom
column5: nicoise salad and the cheese sauce were placed on top. The presentation was amazing and the taste lived up to the expectations according to the appearance. Little Goat was a great go to for lunch
column6: but they tend to get very busy during lunch so get there early!
